captain.name: The Captain
captain.title: Scourge of the Spacelanes
captain.description: A legendary privateer whose name carries fear and respect across the spacelanes, commanding crews, fleets, and fortunes with ease.
captain.philosophy: Freedom is taken. Reputation keeps it.
captain.emphasis: Leadership, raiding, naval tactics, reputation, profit
captain.voiceStyle: Confident, theatrical, amused. Speaks like someone who knows the galaxy is watching.
captain.values: Freedom, loyalty, profit, control through legend
captain.tooltip: The Captain reflects your character through command, reputation, and life beyond the law

levelGreetings.1: Ahoy there! You want freedom, profit, and adventure? Welcome aboard.
levelGreetings.2: Your first successful raid! That thrill never really fades.
levelGreetings.3: You’re learning to pick targets and squeeze profit. Good pirating.
levelGreetings.4: Your crew respects you now. That’s when a captain is born.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to legend. The navies are starting to notice.
levelGreetings.6: Your name’s whispered in ports across the sector. Perfect.
levelGreetings.7: You’ve outsailed fleets and cracked defenses. Masterful work.
levelGreetings.8: Others sail under your banner now. That’s real power.
levelGreetings.9: Almost there. The spacelanes are already bending around you.
levelGreetings.10: Master Privateer. May your sails be full and your cannons thunder.

privateer_raider.confirmation: Choose targets wisely and leave nothing behind.

privateer_commander.greeting: Commander. Crews move at your word.
privateer_commander.confirmation: Lead with precision and inspire loyalty through action.

privateer_merchant.confirmation: Control routes and markets to control outcomes.

privateer_legend.greeting: Legendary Privateer. Your name opens doors.
privateer_legend.confirmation: Let reputation do half the work.

privateer_sovereign.confirmation: You shape trade, power, and fear itself.

guidance.class: Be a better captain, raider, and leader.
guidance.talents: Leadership and ship combat define you.
guidance.abilities: Charisma leads. Intelligence plans. Dexterity fights.
guidance.hp: A captain who falls doesn’t stay captain.
guidance.summary: Command the ship. Command the legend.

tier2: The stories about me are useful.
tier4: I don’t correct lies that keep me alive.
tier5: If you knew who I was, you’d stop listening.
